about_the_game:
Waltz is a pure and innocent soul who awoke in Downtown, and Jam is the lovable dog who was there waiting. They will face seven trials to complete the ticket that will take them to either Uptown or Undertown. There will be difficult and challenging moments, but together they can overcome any trial. Join them on this amazing and heartwarming journey.



No more adventuring alone

Jam is not just cute and lovable. (Although that would be enough!) Jam can lift Waltz to high and hard-to-reach places and push heavy objects. Discover new abilities for Jam as you adventure. Jam will continue to open new paths that you couldn't explore on your own.



Collect toys to solve puzzles and use in battle

During your adventure, you will discover special toys left behind by the legendary toy craftsman. Each toy has its own fun abilities—some can cut things, while others can push objects away. Use the toys to interact with the environment, solve puzzles that block your path, and defeat monsters.



Explore 7 unique areas and complete your ticket

Each of the seven areas is inspired by one of the seven deadly sins and is filled with its own unique character. Every area unveils new stories, secrets, and surprises. Overcome the trials of each region and collect stamps on your ticket. Reach the end to uncover the secret of your journey.



Conquer thrilling battles against giant enemies

At the end of every trial, a colossal battle awaits. There are also plenty of hidden battles against massive foes. Overcoming these battles against bosses with unique patterns is an exhilarating and fun challenge. Learn the bosses' patterns and use your toys—and sometimes even Jam's abilities—to take on these thrilling and intense battles.

name: Waltz and Jam

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500, Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050, RX 560
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700, Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070, RX 6600
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
